session.speaker: Jerren Every
session.bio: Jerren Every is a Technical Team Lead at M&T Bank in Buffalo. He is currently focused on Test Automation, Process Automation and CI/CD Processes. Jerren started his career in tech in 2015 and has worked in Retail, Utility and Financial organizations.
session.title: Slaying The Leviathan - Containerized Execution of Test Automation
session.abstract: In this conversation we will be discussing containerized parallel automation with Docker and Ruby/Cucumber. Additionally we will be discussing concepts, concerns and best practices that could be applied with a different tech stack.
